<h1 align="center">Earmuffs</h1>
<p align="center">A simple volume limiter for Windows, protecting your hearing without you noticing.</p>

<p align="center">
  <img width="700" src="https://github.com/digitallyoli/Earmuffs/blob/master/.github/assets/screenshot.png?raw=true">
</p>

## Features

- Fully customisable volume limiter
  - Set a hard volume limit that you can't exceed
  - Set a soft volume limit that gradually decreases the volume to a target level (can be subtle enough that you don't notice)
- Option to start automatically when you sign in to Windows
- Quickly enable or disable the limits from the system tray
- No installers or admin privilages needed, just download and run

## Download

[Download the latest version from GitHub.](https://github.com/digitallyoli/earmuffs/releases/latest)

## Uninstalling

To completely remove Earmuffs from your system, delete the following files/folders:

- `Earmuffs.exe`
- `%appdata%\oli.digital\Earmuffs`
- `%temp%\.net\Earmuffs`
